This is an important title for Jesus. (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/guidelines-sonofgodprinciples ]])
This is an important title that Jesus uses for God. (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/guidelines-sonofgodprinciples ]])

This is an important title for God. (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/guidelines-sonofgodprinciples ]])
Jesus, as the Son of God, followed and obeyed his Father's leadership on earth, because Jesus knew the Father loved him. (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/guidelines-sonofgodprinciples ]])
contextId.glQuote: whatever the Father is doing, the Son does these things also.

contextId.occurrenceNote: These are important titles that describe the relationship between Jesus and God. (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/guidelines-sonofgodprinciples ]])
Jesus, as the Son of God, followed and obeyed his Father's leadership on earth, because Jesus knew the Father loved him. (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/guidelines-sonofgodprinciples ]])
contextId.glQuote: For the Father loves the Son

contextId.occurrenceNote: These are important titles that describe the relationship between God and Jesus. (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/guidelines-sonofgodprinciples ]])
The word "for" marks a comparison. The Son of God carries out judgment for God the Father. (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/guidelines-sonofgodprinciples ]])
contextId.glQuote: For the Father judges no one, but he has given all judgment to the Son

contextId.occurrenceNote: God the Son must be honored and worshiped just like God the Father. If we fail to honor God the Son, then we also fail to honor God the Father. (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/guidelines-sonofgodprinciples ]])
contextId.glQuote: honor the Son just as ... the Father. The one who does not honor the Son does not honor the Father

contextId.occurrenceNote: The voice of Jesus, the Son of God, will raise dead people from the grave. (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/guidelines-sonofgodprinciples ]])
contextId.glQuote: the dead will hear the voice of the Son of God, and those who hear will live

contextId.occurrenceNote: This is an important title for Jesus. (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/guidelines-sonofgodprinciples ]])
The word "For" marks a comparison. The Son of God has the power to give life, just as the Father does. (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/guidelines-sonofgodprinciples ]])
contextId.glQuote: For just as the Father has life in himself, so he has also given to the Son so that he has life in himself

contextId.occurrenceNote: These are important titles that describe the relationship between God and Jesus. (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/guidelines-sonofgodprinciples ]])
These are important titles that describe the relationship between God and Jesus. (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/guidelines-sonofgodprinciples ]])
This is an important title for God. (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/guidelines-sonofgodprinciples ]])
This is an important title for God. (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/guidelines-sonofgodprinciples ]])
These are important titles that describe the relationship between Jesus and God. (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/guidelines-sonofgodprinciples ]])
contextId.glQuote: Son of Man ... God the Father

contextId.occurrenceNote: This is an important title for God. (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/guidelines-sonofgodprinciples ]])
God the Father and God the Son will save forever those who believe in Jesus. (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/guidelines-sonofgodprinciples ]])
contextId.glQuote: Everyone whom the Father gives me will come to me

contextId.occurrenceNote: This is an important title for God. (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/guidelines-sonofgodprinciples ]])
This is an important title for God. (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/guidelines-sonofgodprinciples ]])
This is an important title for God. (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/guidelines-sonofgodprinciples ]])
This is an important title for God. (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/guidelines-sonofgodprinciples ]])
This is an important title for God. (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/guidelines-sonofgodprinciples ]])
Jesus, the Son of God, has authority because of his special relationship with his Father. (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/guidelines-sonofgodprinciples ]])
contextId.glQuote: I am not alone, but I am with the Father who sent me

contextId.occurrenceNote: This is an important title for God. If your language must state whose Father this is, you could say "my Father" since Jesus switches to that in the following verses. (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/guidelines-sonofgodprinciples ]])

This is an important title for God. If your language must state whose Father this is, you could say "my Father" since Jesus switches to that in the following verses. (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/guidelines-sonofgodprinciples ]])
Jesus indicates that to know him is to also know the Father. Both Father and Son are God. "Father" is an important title for God. (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/guidelines-sonofgodprinciples ]])
contextId.glQuote: You know neither me nor my Father; if you had known me, you would have known my Father also

contextId.occurrenceNote: This is an important title for God. (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/guidelines-sonofgodprinciples ]])

This is a special title for God. Some languages may require the use of a possessive before the noun. Alternate translation: "his Father" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/guidelines-sonofgodprinciples ]])
"I am only saying what my Father taught me to say." The word "Father" is an important title for God. (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/guidelines-sonofgodprinciples ]])
contextId.glQuote: As the Father taught me, I speak these things

contextId.occurrenceNote: "Son" is an important title for Jesus, the Son of God. Jesus was speaking about himself. Alternate translation: "If I, the Son, set you free" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/guidelines-sonofgodprinciples]] and [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-123person ]])
contextId.glQuote: if the Son sets you free

contextId.occurrenceNote: Here the Jewish leaders claim God as their spiritual Father. This is an important title for God. (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/guidelines-sonofgodprinciples ]])

The word "Father" is an important title for God. No one knows God the Father like Jesus, the Son of God. Alternate translation: "it is my Father who honors me, and you say that he is your God" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/guidelines-sonofgodprinciples ]])
contextId.glQuote: it is my Father who glorifies me—about whom you say that he is your God

contextId.occurrenceNote: God the Father and God the Son know each other unlike anyone else knows them. "Father" is an important title for God. (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/guidelines-sonofgodprinciples ]])
contextId.glQuote: The Father knows me, and I know the Father

contextId.occurrenceNote: This is an important title for God. (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/guidelines-sonofgodprinciples ]])
"This is what my Father has commanded me to do." The word "Father" is an important title for God. (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/guidelines-sonofgodprinciples ]])
contextId.glQuote: I have received this command from my Father

contextId.occurrenceNote: The word "Father" is an important title for God. (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/guidelines-sonofgodprinciples ]])
contextId.glQuote: My Father, who has given them to me

contextId.occurrenceNote: Jesus, God the Son, and God the Father are one. The word "Father" is an important title for God. (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/guidelines-sonofgodprinciples ]])
contextId.glQuote: I and the Father are one

contextId.occurrenceNote: Jesus performed the miracles by the power of God. The word "Father" is an important title for God. (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/guidelines-sonofgodprinciples ]])
contextId.glQuote: Jesus answered them, "I have shown you many good works from the Father
